meta_description.text: Rez is a musical rail shooter developed by United Game Artists and published by Sega for the Dreamcast and PlayStation 2. people_also_ask.question: Who is Rez?
people_also_ask.heading: Rez was developed by United Game Artists, an internal studio of Sega led by Tetsuya Mizuguchi, who was then known for his work on racing games. The original concept for Rez originated between 1994 and 1995. ... He built up his new team at what would become United Game Artists.
people_also_ask.title: Rez - Wikipedia

people_also_ask.question: Is Rez infinite PS4 VR only?
people_also_ask.heading: It's a VR remake of Tetsuya Mizuguchi's trippy musical shooter for the Dreamcast and PS2; the PC and PS4 versions can be played in 2D as well, but the Quest version is of course VR-only.12-Oct-2020

knowledge_panel.description: rez is a musical rail shooter developed by united game artists and published by sega for the dreamcast and playstation 2. it was released in japan in 2001, followed by releases to the united states and europe in 2002. the game was ported to xbox 360 as rez hd by q entertainment and hexadrive in 2008. wikipedia
